overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by physical presence or permanent establishment.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Personal deductions and exemptions vary depending on factors such as age, disability, and family status.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 10.75% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.deductions: Standard deductions apply, including expenses related to operations, depreciation, and certain investments.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence may be exempt under certain conditions.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 10% on certain basic goods and services, such as food and medicine.
vat_gst.exemptions: Healthcare, education, and financial services are exempt.

property_tax.exemptions: Owner-occupied residential property with a value below a certain threshold.

special_economic_zones.name: San Juan del Sur Free Trade Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Exemption from taxes on import/export, corporate income, property, and municipal taxes.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from crypto is taxed as regular income under the personal income tax rates.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from crypto are taxed under the capital gains tax rates.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from NFTs is taxed as regular income under the personal income tax rates.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from NFTs are taxed under the capital gains tax rates.

additional_notes.political_risks: Political instability and corruption may affect tax administration and enforcement.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Economic challenges, including inflation and currency fluctuations, may impact tax calculations.
additional_notes.legal_system: Tax disputes may face delays and inconsistencies due to an underdeveloped legal system.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 127th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
